titlepage.titleproper: Inventory of the Laurence L. Wilson collection
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California

defitem.label: Encoded by:
defitem.item: Machine-readable finding aid derived from Microsoft Word and MARC record by Jill Golden.

titlepage.p: © 2011 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Materials relating to conditions in the Japanese-occupied Philippines during World War II and the return of American troops to the Philippines, including writings, leaflets, posters, and proclamations.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Laurence L. Wilson collection, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1945.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the library catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Materials relating to conditions in the Japanese-occupied Philippines during World War II and the return of American troops to the Philippines, including writings, leaflets, posters, and proclamations.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: World War, 1939-1945--Philippines.

did.unittitle: Kiangan during the Japanese Occupation, compiled historical materials,
Baguio during the Japanese Occupation, compiled historical materials,
Malolos during the Japanese Occupation, compiled historical materials,
Tagumpay, Emilio Aguinaldo presidential candidate pamphlet,
Writings on the Philippines, Japanese propaganda, and strategy,
Asociación de los Veteranos de la Revolución,
U.S. forces in the Philippines documents,
President Osmeña executive orders and food price lists,
Telephone directory, Office of Minister Sabido,

scopecontent.p: Includes presidential proclamations, "Welcome MacArthur" signs, political posters, and other oversize printed materials
